description: Pay my tribute to dear friend Sri Cho Ramaswamy on the 47th anniversary of Thuglak: PM Modi
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Addressed the 47th anniversary programme of Thuglak magazine via video conferencing.

Remembered Cho Ramaswamy & his wisdom. It is difficult to imagine Thuglak and Cho without each other. He was a multi-faceted personality. Cho was a master of humour & satire. His satire stood out because it made his criticism loveable, even to those he criticised.

Cho made Thuglak a platform for all. He made the magazine a weapon against all divisive forces & fought for a corruption-free system. I ‎wish Shri S. Gurumurthy & his team the best. I hope they take Thuglak to new heights and carry forward the legacy of Cho.
